Actually I believe Jianjun is on this list!  I wonder if he's still 
reading? Jianjun and I have spoken with each other at several 
conferences in the past.

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Ian Badcoe <ian_badcoe@y...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 	This thesis was announced on comp.ai.genetic I didn't read 
it all, but I 
> was interested in his HCF selection system (Hierarchical Fair 
Competition), 
> which is not dissimilar to the discussions of speciation and who 
competes 
> which whom(*) that we had a few weeks ago.  At least it's not 
dissimilar to 
> thoughts I was trying to explain...
> 
> 	Chapter 4 is where he explains it and to my mind the 
diagrams at the tops 
> of pages 96 and 99 (his numbering, acrobat calls them 110 and 113) 
tell the 
> whole story...
> 
> http://www.cse.msu.edu/~hujianju/Hu_thesis_print.pdf
> 
> 	Ian B
> 
> (*) oooh, flashy grammar
>
